results.idea: 20-day momentum (cross-sectional zscore of returns)
results.description: Used SUGGESTION1 by using price returns; SUGGESTION2 N/A (no vector fields); SUGGESTION3 N/A (price coverage high); SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing widely-used fields (close) to ensure signal robustness. Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence set to 0.75 because momentum is well-documented but cyclical.

results.idea: Volume spike momentum (returns scaled by recent volume surge)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 using two fields (close, volume). No vector fields so SUGGESTION2 skipped. Assumed high coverage so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Chose common fields per SUGGESTION4. Follows KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence 0.68 due to execution and liquidity risk.

results.idea: Mean reversion on 5-day zscore of returns
results.description: Single high-coverage field (close) used per SUGGESTION4. SUGGESTION1 minimal (1 field) because simplest mean reversion is effective. No vector fields. Respect KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.70 based on short-term reversal literature.

results.idea: Volatility breakout: returns times implied/realized vol gap
results.description: Used two fields (close, implied_vol). SUGGESTION1 satisfied. If implied_vol has lower coverage apply ts_backfill in practice; here noted. No vector fields. Chose common vol fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.62 given implied vol noise.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum (post-earnings drift)
results.description: Two fields (earnings_surprise, close). SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields. If surprise coverage <0.6 use ts_backfill in preprocessing. Chose widely-used earnings data per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.66 (empirical support but event-dependent).

results.idea: Analyst revision acceleration (recent upgrade momentum)
results.description: Fields: analyst_revision_count and close. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; SUGGESTION3: if analyst_revision_count sparse, apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Preference for high-user fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.6 due to noisy revision data.

results.idea: Insider buying signal (vec_avg of insider transactions * short-term returns)
results.description: Vector field insider_txn_vector wrapped with SUGGESTION2 vec_avg(). Added close for momentum per SUGGESTION1. If insider coverage low, ts_backfill recommended. Used popular insider data per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.58 (informative but sparse).

results.idea: High short interest reversal (short_interest decline predicts rebound)
results.description: Two fields: short_interest and close. Used SUGGESTION1. If short_interest sparse consider ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: short interest widely used. Confidence 0.55 due to structural short squeezes risk.

results.idea: Relative strength vs sector (cross-sectional rank of returns minus sector mean)
results.description: Used close and sector grouping (sector used only as group parameter per KEEP_IN_MIND4). SUGGESTION1 applied. No vector fields. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.72 as sector-relative momentum is robust.

results.idea: Small-cap momentum tilt (momentum scaled by inverse market cap)
results.description: Fields: close and market_cap. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields and SUGGESTION4 prioritizes high-coverage fields. No vectors. Confidence 0.63 as size interacts with momentum historically.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for liquidity (returns scaled by turnover)
results.description: Used close and turnover (volume/float). SUGGESTION1 satisfied. If turnover sparse apply ts_backfill. Chosen because liquidity impacts tradeability per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Acceleration momentum (ts_delta of returns)
results.description: Single field close; used ts_delta to capture acceleration. SUGGESTION1 minimal. High coverage so no backfill. Confidence 0.6 for capturing trend changes.

results.idea: Price / cashflow mean reversion
results.description: Two fields: close and free_cash_flow_per_share. SUGGESTION1 used both. Fundamental coverage may be lower => use ts_backfill if needed. SUGGESTION4 prefers common fundamentals. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Earnings revision surprise (ts_delta of analyst EPS estimates)
results.description: Fields: analyst_eps_est and close. Applied SUGGESTION1. If estimates sparse, use ts_backfill. Chosen due to predictive power per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High dividend yield momentum (momentum in dividend growers)
results.description: Fields: dividend_yield and close. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Dividend fields typically high coverage. Confidence 0.52 due to income tilt characteristics.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after volatility spike
results.description: Fields: close and realized_vol (or ts_std_dev of returns). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. If realized_vol sparse use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.6 based on mean-reversion after shocks.

results.idea: Low beta outperformance (long low beta, short high beta)
results.description: Fields: close and beta (historical). SUGGESTION1 applied. Beta usually high-coverage; if not use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.56 historically mixed but defensive.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by earnings growth
results.description: Fields: close and earnings_growth. SUGGESTION1 used both; earnings data might need ts_backfill if sparse. SUGGESTION4: fundamentals common. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term reversal in high-turnover names
results.description: Fields: close and volume. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.6 given liquidity-driven reversals.

results.idea: Mean reversion on intraday range (high-low)
results.description: Fields: high and low (two fields). Applied SUGGESTION1. No vectors. Intraday fields are common; coverage assumed adequate. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Pair spread mean reversion (relative to a benchmark)
results.description: Fields: close and benchmark_close. SUGGESTION1 applied with two fields. No vectors. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.6 when pairs stable.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low idiosyncratic volatility
results.description: Fields: close and idio_vol. Used SUGGESTION1. If idio_vol sparse use ts_backfill. Preference for high-user fields. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Seasonal/monthly effect (month-of-year returns)
results.description: Single field close with ts_step or date logic implied. SUGGESTION1 minimal. No vectors. Confidence 0.45 as seasonals weaker.

results.idea: Relative order flow imbalance (buy vs sell volumes vector average)
results.description: Used order_flow_vector wrapped with vec_avg per SUGGESTION2 and close for effect. If order flow sparse apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Confidence 0.53 due to data noise.

results.idea: Momentum vs float-adjusted liquidity
results.description: Fields: close and float. SUGGESTION1 used both; float high-coverage. No vectors. Confidence 0.6 balancing momentum and tradability.

results.idea: Cross-sectional volatility rank mean reversion
results.description: Field: ts_std_dev of returns (derived from close). SUGGESTION1 minimal; high coverage. Confidence 0.5 as vol timing is challenging.

results.idea: Momentum after buyback announcements (event-driven)
results.description: Fields: buyback_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 applied. If buyback_flag sparse use ts_backfill; it's event-driven. SUGGESTION4: events used often. Confidence 0.6 for buyback effect.

results.idea: Analyst sentiment vec_avg (vector of analyst scores) * returns
results.description: Wrapped analyst_scores_vector with vec_avg per SUGGESTION2, paired with close. If vector sparse backfill. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Rumor/news sentiment momentum
results.description: Fields: news_sentiment and close. SUGGESTION1 used both. If news_sentiment coverage <0.6 apply ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.5 due to noise.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on rising institutional ownership
results.description: Fields: inst_ownership and close. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; if inst_ownership sparse apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 favors institutional data. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Dividend surprise momentum (dividend change * returns)
results.description: Fields: dividend_change and close. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Dividend changes common; no backfill typically needed. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by earnings yield (inverse P/E)
results.description: Fields: close and pe_ratio. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. If pe_ratio sparse use ts_backfill. Chose widely-used fundamentals per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by recent insider selling (reduce weight)
results.description: Fields: insider_txn_vector (vec_avg) and close. Applied SUGGESTION2 for vector; SUGGESTION3 if sparse. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Earnings growth mean reversion (high recent growth reverts)
results.description: Fields: earnings_growth and close. SUGGESTION1 used both; fundamentals may need ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Calendar momentum (recent 3-month vs 12-month cross-sectional rank)
results.description: Single field close using comparative returns. SUGGESTION1 minimal. No vectors. Confidence 0.66 from classic momentum factor.

results.idea: Cross-asset trend (equity returns vs commodity returns spread)
results.description: Fields: close and commodity_index_close. SUGGESTION1 applied. If commodity data sparse backfill. Confidence 0.44 as cross-asset links variable.

results.idea: Volatility targeting: long when realised vol below implied vol
results.description: Fields: ts_std_dev of returns and option_implied_vol. SUGGESTION1 used both; implied vol sometimes sparse—ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum combined with positive cashflow surprise
results.description: Fields: close and cashflow_surprise. SUGGESTION1 used both; fundamental surprise may be sparse so ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Price momentum attenuated by high leverage
results.description: Fields: close and leverage_ratio. SUGGESTION1 used both; leverage common in fundamentals. Confidence 0.55 due to balance sheet reliability.

results.idea: Momentum after dividend cut (reverse)
results.description: Fields: dividend_cut_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 used both. Event flags may be sparse so ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum vs peer group (rank within industry group)
results.description: Field: close with group operator industry as group parameter per KEEP_IN_MIND4. SUGGESTION1 minimal but used grouping. No vectors. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Liquidity provider imbalance (vec_sum of signed volumes)
results.description: Used order_flow_vector with vec_sum per SUGGESTION2 and close. If vector coverage low use ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by free cash flow yield
results.description: Fields: close and fcf_yield. SUGGESTION1 applied. FCF yield medium coverage—apply ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum after analyst coverage initiation
results.description: Fields: analyst_coverage_count and close. SUGGESTION1 used both; coverage changes may be sparse—ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum filtered out by rising short interest (reduce weight)
results.description: Fields: short_interest and close. SUGGESTION1 applied. If short_interest sparse, backfill. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum in low float names (amplified effect)
results.description: Fields: close and float. SUGGESTION1 used both. Float high-coverage. Confidence 0.6 but with liquidity risk.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by earnings quality (accruals low)
results.description: Fields: close and accruals_ratio. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. If accruals sparse use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum vs volatility regime (only in trending low-vol regimes)
results.description: Fields: close and market_vol_index. SUGGESTION1 used both. If market_vol sparse backfill. Confidence 0.62 when regime filtering applied well.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by option buyer activity (open interest delta)
results.description: Fields: option_oi_delta and close. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; option data may be sparse—ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum after positive supply-side news (production increase)
results.description: Fields: production_revision and close. SUGGESTION1 applied; production data may be sparse so ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum with earnings quality filter (operating margin expansion)
results.description: Fields: close and op_margin_delta. SUGGESTION1 used both. If margin data sparse use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Price momentum after major index reweighting
results.description: Fields: index_inclusion_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 used event flag; event data sparse—ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.58 around rebalances.

results.idea: Momentum moderated by high financial leverage (reduce weight)
results.description: Fields: close and debt_to_equity. SUGGESTION1 applied. Debt metrics common; no backfill likely. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum on FX-hedged returns for multinationals
results.description: Fields: close and fx_hedge_flag. SUGGESTION1 used both. If fx_hedge_flag sparse use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.48 due to complexity.

results.idea: Momentum in stocks with rising gross margin
results.description: Fields: close and gross_margin_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Fundamentals may need backfill. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum vs credit spreads (corporate spread influence)
results.description: Fields: close and credit_spread. SUGGESTION1 used both; credit data coverage variable—ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum with positive social sentiment (social_sentiment vec_avg)
results.description: Wrapped social_sentiment_vector with vec_avg per SUGGESTION2 and paired with close. If social coverage <0.6 used ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.51 due to noise.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by improving ROIC
results.description: Fields: close and roic_delta. SUGGESTION1 satisfied; fundamentals may need ts_backfill. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme 1-day moves (zscore of daily return)
results.description: Field: close only using ts_zscore of daily return. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Confidence 0.64 for classic short-term reversal.

results.idea: Momentum boosted by rising revenue surprise
results.description: Fields: revenue_surprise and close. SUGGESTION1 used both; revenue surprise may be sparse—ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Price momentum vs analyst sentiment delta
results.description: Fields: analyst_sentiment_delta and close. SUGGESTION1 applied; sentiment may be sparse => ts_backfill. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum attenuated by high capital intensity
results.description: Fields: close and capex_to_assets. SUGGESTION1 used both; capital metrics common. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum in firms with declining supply chain risk
results.description: Fields: supply_chain_risk_score and close. SUGGESTION1 used both; supply_chain data may be sparse so ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum after positive patent filings (event-driven)
results.description: Fields: patent_filing_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 used event flag; if sparse use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.47 for niche events.

results.idea: Momentum in companies with improving current ratio
results.description: Fields: close and current_ratio_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Fundamentals may need ts_backfill. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by analyst consensus upgrade rate
results.description: Fields: upgrade_rate and close. SUGGESTION1 used both. Upgrade_rate may be sparse—ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum after buy-side accumulation (institutional_flow_vector vec_sum)
results.description: Applied vec_sum to inst_flow_vector per SUGGESTION2 and combined with close. If vector sparse use ts_backfill. SUGGESTION1 met. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum with FX tailwind for exporters
results.description: Fields: close and fx_move_for_currency. SUGGESTION1 used both. FX data usually high coverage. Confidence 0.49 due to correlation complexities.

results.idea: Momentum moderated by rising pension liabilities
results.description: Fields: close and pension_liability_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Pension metrics may be sparse—ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Momentum following large insider buys (event flag)
results.description: Fields: large_insider_buy_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 used both; event flag sparse => ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum combined with improving gross profit margin stability
results.description: Fields: close and gross_margin_stddev (derived). SUGGESTION1 used both. Derived metrics high coverage. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum focusing on low analyst dispersion names
results.description: Fields: close and analyst_dispersion. SUGGESTION1 used both; dispersion often available. Confidence 0.58 for predictability.

results.idea: Momentum amplified by improving receivables turnover
results.description: Fields: close and receivables_turnover_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied; accountings metrics may be sparse—ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum after positive macro surprise (GDP/PMI)
results.description: Fields: close and macro_surprise. SUGGESTION1 used both; macro coverage high. Confidence 0.44 as macro links variable.

results.idea: Momentum with low earnings estimate dispersion
results.description: Fields: close and eps_dispersion. SUGGESTION1 applied. Dispersion often available; confidence 0.57.

results.description: Fields: sector_etf_flow and close (sector used as group for mapping if needed). SUGGESTION1 applied; flow data may need ts_backfill. Confidence 0.53.

results.description: Fields: close and days_receivable_delta. SUGGESTION1 used both. Accounting metrics may be sparse—ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.49.

results.description: Fields: mna_rumor_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 used event flag; often sparse so backfill optional. Confidence 0.46.

results.description: Fields: close and inventory_turnover_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied; inventory metrics might be sparse—ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by lower supplier concentration risk
results.description: Fields: close and supplier_concentration_score. SUGGESTION1 used both; alternative data may be sparse—ts_backfill if coverage low. Confidence 0.42.

results.description: Fields: cost_cut_flag and close. SUGGESTION1 applied; event data sparse—ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.47.

results.description: Fields: close and gross_margin_trend. SUGGESTION1 used both; fundamentals may need backfill. Confidence 0.53.

results.description: Fields: close and capex_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied; capex data common. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by improving leverage trend
results.description: Fields: close and leverage_delta. SUGGESTION1 used both. If leverage data sparse use ts_backfill. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by improving operating cashflow momentum
results.description: Fields: close and op_cashflow_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied; cashflow often available. Confidence 0.56.

results.description: Fields: esg_score_delta and close. SUGGESTION1 used both; ESG coverage variable—ts_backfill if <0.6. Confidence 0.47.

results.description: Fields: close and implied_skew. SUGGESTION1 satisfied; implied skew coverage may vary—ts_backfill optional. Confidence 0.52.

results.description: Fields: close and gross_margin with group industry parameter used per KEEP_IN_MIND4. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields. Confidence 0.59.
